TopicTitle: Modular fairings buggy when the "view" icon is clicked

Articles.Content:
ksp2-Fairing-Bug

In the above GIF you can see that when clicking the "view" icon on a fairing, odd glitchy movements can be observed when mousing over the root node under the fairing. Then, when re-clicking the view icon, the fairing does not snap back into place. Instead, one side stays "open".
